home.title: Hi, I'm Christian <1>Cybersecurity</1> Student and <2>Front End Development</2>
home.description: I create modern and functional websites, and I will perform security audits to protect your online business from potential threats in the future.
home.description1: I’m a front-end developer and ethical hacker with a passion for creating modern, responsive, and user-focused web applications while ensuring they are secure against potential threats.
home.description2: If you need a website, I can design and develop web pages from scratch that provide seamless and engaging experiences for your users. I specialize in building web applications that are both aesthetically modern and highly functional.
home.description3: On the other hand, if you’re looking to secure your applications and systems, I offer security audits and pentesting services. My approach is to identify vulnerabilities and strengthen the security of your platforms to protect them from potential attacks.
home.description4: My goal is to continue learning and evolving with the latest technologies, both in web development and cybersecurity.
home.currentlyWorking: In progress to be an ethical hacker
home.availableOpportunities: I’m always open to opportunities, whether they are freelance or full-time positions, depending on the offer. Feel free to reach out to me sending a direct if you have any questions or requests.

I specialize in building web applications that are both aesthetically modern and highly functional.

contact.description: If you have any questions or would like to collaborate on a project, feel free to reach out to me. I’m always open to new opportunities and look forward to hearing from you.

anuncio.1: I'm still studying to become an ethical hacker, but you can contact me for front-end development jobs, since I have experience there.
anuncio.3: I'm still working on this portfolio, so if you find any errors, let me know.
